name: Birdie Crush
description:
Let's play amazing Birdie Crush Game. It's amazing endless adventure game. Tap to play and close the pipe. You need to crush all the birds.

It's amazing endless game. Challenge your friends.

Features:
=======
- Tap to play.
- Colourful graphics.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for beam me? Download Now....
